attributes.action: SEND OFFENDERS AND DRUG ADDICTS TO IRAQ
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ITS ABOUT TIME THAT WE SENT OFFENDERS, DRUG ADDICTS AND UNEMPLOYED TO IRAQ. BRING BACK NATIONAL SERVICE AND START KICKING OUR COUNTRY BACK INTO SHAPE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
